attacks.name: Jump Over
attacks.effect: If you opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them. Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Super Singe
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.
